titles.title: Come Just As You Are (easy sweet singable)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come just as you are Oh come just as you are Give up your sin Let the Savior come in And come just as you are{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ye who are toubled and burdened by sin Come just as you are Come to the Savior a new life begin Oh come just as you are{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Deep in your heart sin has written its scar Come just as you are Tho' from the father you've wandered afar Oh come just as you are{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sinful and guilty heart broken and lost Come just as you are Think what your ransom on Calvary cost Oh come just as you are{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naught of your goodness for sin can atone Come just as you are Trust in the merit of Jesus alone And come just as you are{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come with your heartache your sorrow and pain Come just as you are No one has come to the Savior in vain Oh come just as you are{/lang-eng}
